products.title: Audio Technica ATHM50xBT2 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones Black
products.body_html:
Audio Technica ATHM50xBT2 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones Black
 
The ATH-M50xBT2 is the second generation of our critically acclaimed M-Series wireless over-ear headphones. These headphones feature 45 mm large aperture drivers in a wireless design, so listeners will enjoy the same sonic signature of the legendary ATH-M50x studio headphones. With this update, we’ve also introduced several noticeable enhancements, such as improved vocal pickup for better call quality, an updated USB-C connection, and multipoint pairing mode.

Features

Wireless, on-the-go design delivers the same critically acclaimed sonic performance as the original ATH-M50x professional studio headphones
Proprietary 45 mm large-aperture drivers and dedicated amplifier deliver exceptional clarity throughout an extended frequency range, with deep, accurate bass response
Low latency mode improves synchronicity between audio and video for smooth streaming and gaming
Premium audio-grade components, including an AK4331 advanced audio DAC and dedicated internal headphone amp, deliver pure, natural sound
Dual mics and beamforming technology ensure crystal-clear call quality
Sidetone circuitry improves conversations by letting you hear your voice in the headphones when making calls on most smartphones
Microphone can be muted with a simple press of a button
Multipoint pairing function allows you to stay connected to two Bluetooth devices at once
Buttons built into the earcup provide easy control of volume/mute, music, and calls, and give you access to voice assistant (Amazon Alexa Built-in, Google Assistant, Siri)
Google Fast Pair lets you quickly pair headphones with an Android smartphone or other device
A-T Connect app gives you additional control: activate low latency mode, adjust and save EQ to the headphones, change L/R volume balance, select desired voice assistant, locate misplaced headphones, change codecs, and more
Up to 50 hours of continuous use on a full charge and up to 3 hours of use on a 10-minute rapid charge (via USB-C connection)
Compatible with high-quality LDAC and AAC codecs
Over-ear design for excellent sound isolation in loud environments
Professional-grade earpad and headband material for long-lasting durability and comfort
Includes 1.2 m (3.9") cable for optional wired connection

Expect More from Your Wireless
The ATH-M50xBT2 headphones deliver the legendary M50x studio sound – with exceptional clarity and deep, accurate bass response – for an exhilarating wireless listening experience.

Enhanced Call Quality
Dual mics and beamforming technology provide exceptional vocal pickup, resulting in crystal-clear phone calls and reliable communication with the built-in Amazon Alexa voice assistant.

50 Hr Battery Life
With the ATH-M50xBT2 there’s nothing to hold you back. You get up to 50 hours of continuous use on a full charge.

Personalised Listening Experience
Download the A-T Connect app to gain greater control of your headphones. Easily activate low latency mode, adjust EQ, change L/R volume balance, select desired voice assistant, locate misplaced headphones, change codecs, and more.

A Permanent Quest for Quality
How do we improve on the original ATH-M50xBT and the same critically acclaimed sonic performance as the original ATH-M50x professional studio headphones? We expand the limits of audio technology, pursuing an ever-changing purity of sound.

products.title: Denon AH-D7200 Reference Quality Over-Ear Headphones in Walnut
products.body_html:
Denon AHD7200 Reference Quality Over-Ear Headphones in Walnut
FEATURES - AH-D7200
 
Reference Quality
Over-Ear Headphone
AH-D7200 is Denon’s new reference headphone, drawing on more than 50 years’ experience in headphone design and development. Over five decades we have refined our expertise in making fine-sounding headphones so comfortable you’ll just want to keep on listening. These premium headphones use our unique, Japanese-made FreeEdge drivers, which deliver a precise pistonic motion for ultra-accurate sound with minimal distortion. The drivers are mounted on vibration-reducing engineering resin baffles, fitted into self-damping real walnut housings designed to bring warmth and life to the sound. A detachable 7N-purity copper cable, made in Japan to Denon’s exacting specification, ensures the best possible signal transmission – it’s fitted with a durable machine-cut metal plug with an ornamental copper ring. The ear cups are suspended on a headband finished in real sheepskin leather, with ergonomically curved diecast aluminium hangers, while the memory foam ear-cushions are covered with an extremely soft artificial leathr developed specifically for the AH-D7200. Every part of this no-compromise design is all about sound quality, comfort – and the ultimate listening experience.
 
Ultra-high-quality connection
A detachable 7N-purity copper cable, made in Japan to Denon's exacting specification, ensure the best possible signal transmission - it's fitted with a durable machine-cut metal plug with an ornamental copper ring.
 
Unique FreeEdge driver technology
At the heart of the AH-D7200 is that 50mm FreeEdge driver diaphragm, made from a nano-fibre material chosen for its rigidity and low mass. This delivers an accurate pistonic motion without distortion, and is also self-damping to cancel out unwanted resonances within the diaphragm. It’s mounted in a soft, compliant surround, making it easier for it to move in response to the music signal without flexing or distorting, for the purest possible sound.
 
Real wood Ear cups
The beautiful 100% natural walnut ear cups enhance the sound experience. They are self-damping and strong, eliminating unwanted vibrations for super-detailed reproduction that brings concert hall-like life, warmth, and musicality to your listening experience.
 
Luxurious craftmanship
The outside of the headband is adorned with natural sheepskin leather for a soft luxurious feel, while the inside uses stitched engineered leather for ultimate comfort and durability.
 
Wearing comfort
The headband deploys perfectly ergonomically contoured die-cast aluminum construction for optimized comfort and fit. The ear-pads are gently wrapped in an extremely soft engineered leather developed specifically for the AH-D7200, and memory foam, allowing them to conform to the shape of your head for the most comfortable fit. Every component of this compromise free design is all about sound quality and comfort - the ultimate listening experience.
 
Perfect Adjustment
To accomodate varied head-sizes, the adjustable headband uses positive ball-bearing click-stops for precise and repeatable adjusment. Numbered markings indicate how to restore your personal setting quickly and precisely.

products.title: Audio Technica ATH-M50XBT2 DS Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - Limited Edition Deep Sea Blue
products.body_html:
Audio Technica ATH-M50XBT2 DS Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - Limited Edition Deep Sea Blue
 

Studio-grade sound with high-end drivers

At the core of the Audio-Technica M50xBT2 Bluetooth Headphones are Audio Technica’s proprietary 45mm large-aperture drivers complete with a dedicated headphone amplifier. These premium-quality components help to deliver the sparkling highs and powerful low-end response, that made the original headphones so sought after. As well as the dedicated headphone amp, the M50xBT2s feature an advanced AK331 audio DAC chip to ensure the highest possible fidelity and clarity.

Not only does it excel with wireless devices, but the headphones also feature a wired connection helping to conserve battery power or provide optimised performance when in the studio. The headphones are also now compatible with AAC and LDAC wireless audio codecs ensuring you get the best possible sound no matter what you’re playing.

Dual built-in microphone with sidetone circuitry

For those who want to enjoy music on the move, Audio Technica have incorporated a dual microphone design that allows you to take calls while you’re out and about. Improving on the original design, the BT2s feature an enhanced vocal pickup utilising beamforming mic technology. The result is ultra-clear sound when taking phone calls and maximum intelligibility when using your built-in voice assistant.

One of the most unique features of the dual mics is the introduction of sidetone circuitry. This allows you to hear your voice in the headphones whilst making calls on virtually any smartphone.

Multi-pairing and onboard controls

Stay connected to two Bluetooth devices at once using multipoint pairing. This is great for instant switches between devices. For example, you can pair your headphones to your computer at home and your smartphone for when you are on the move.

Not only that, but the headphones feature onboard controls which allow you to change volume, control the music and take calls. You can also use access your personal voice assistant at the touch of a button.

Up to 50 hours battery life and fast charging technology

Never miss your favourite song again. The rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery provides up to 50 hours of continuous use from a full charge. The newly introduced USB-C connection allows for ultra-fast charging, providing up to 3 hours of use from a quick 10 minute charge.

A-T Connect App for advanced settings

Download and connect your headphones to the A-T connect app and access a range of advanced settings. From the app you can activate low latency mode, adjust the EQ of your headphones (and save the settings directly to them), change the L/R volume balance and even switch between audio codecs.

products.title: Sony WHCH520W Wireless Headphones White
products.body_html:
Sony WHCH520WCE7 Wireless Headphones White

Sony WH-CH520 Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones – All-Day Comfort & Superior Sound

The Sony WH-CH520 Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones are designed for all-day listening without the hassle of wires. Perfect for music lovers and busy professionals alike, these headphones provide crystal-clear sound and the convenience of Bluetooth connectivity, allowing you to connect up to two devices simultaneously.

Multipoint Bluetooth for Seamless Connection

Enjoy wireless freedom with Bluetooth Multipoint technology. The Sony WH-CH520 headphones easily connect to your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, allowing you to switch between two devices without the need to disconnect. Fast Pair and Swift Pair features offer quick, effortless pairing with compatible Android and Windows devices.

Impressive 50-Hour Battery Life

With up to 50 hours of playtime on a single charge, the Sony WH-CH520 lets you immerse yourself in music, podcasts, and calls all day long. When you're low on battery, a quick 3-minute charge gives you 1.5 hours of playback, so you're always ready to go.

Superior Sony Sound Quality

Experience exceptional sound quality with Sony's Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE), which restores the details in your digital music, bringing it closer to the original recording quality. Additionally, 360 Reality Audio delivers a more immersive listening experience, letting you feel as though the music is all around you. Personalize your sound preferences using the Sony Headphones Connect app.

Clear Calls with Noise Suppression

The Sony WH-CH520 ensures super-clear phone calls with integrated noise suppression technology, making it easy to communicate even in noisy environments.

Long-Lasting Comfort

Designed for comfort, these on-ear headphones feature a lightweight design, adjustable headband, and soft earpads, ensuring a perfect fit for long listening sessions. Whether you’re working, studying, or relaxing, the Sony WH-CH520 headphones stay comfortable all day long.

Enjoy wireless listening, long battery life, and clear calls with the Sony WH-CH520 Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones. Get ready to elevate your audio experience with Sony’s superior sound technology and comfort. Perfect for everyday use, these headphones are a must-have for music enthusiasts and professionals alike.

products.title: Bowers & Wilkins PX8 Noise Cancelling Headphones Royal Burgundy
products.body_html:
Bowers & Wilkins PX8 Noise Cancelling Headphones Royal Burgundy

Introducing the Bowers & Wilkins Px8 Noise Cancelling Wireless Over-Ear Headphones in Black – your gateway to music in its purest form. As the flagship offering from Bowers & Wilkins, the Px8 seamlessly blends unmatched performance, luxurious comfort, intelligent technology, and innovative features to redefine your auditory experience.

Unveiling the Power of Premium Audio by Bowers & Wilkins

At the heart of the Px8 headphones lies a high-resolution 24-bit digital signal processor, paired with cutting-edge driver technology, designed to unveil intricate musical details that might otherwise go unnoticed. The precisely angled Carbon Cone drive units work diligently to minimize distortion, resulting in breathtaking clarity. This acoustic prowess is further enhanced by a meticulously optimized drive unit 'motor system,' featuring upgraded magnets, voice coils, and surrounds, culminating in unrivaled accuracy and lifelike sound reproduction.

Revolutionary Noise Cancellation, Unadulterated Music Enjoyment

Experience music like never before as Px8's proprietary noise cancellation technology excels without compromising the essence of your music. An array of six microphones collaborates to deliver unparalleled noise-cancellation capabilities while ensuring crystal-clear voice calls.

Luxuriate in Premium Comfort for Extended Listening Pleasure

Crafted with materials as exceptional as the sound they produce, the Px8 boasts cast aluminum arms and exquisite Nappa leather trim, leaving no room for doubt about their unique status. With a remarkable 30 hours of playback on a single charge, these headphones allow you to immerse yourself in music for an entire day.

Seamless Control with the Bowers & Wilkins Music App

Tailor your listening experience effortlessly by adjusting settings or activating your smartphone's voice assistant through the Bowers & Wilkins Music app, available on both iOS and Android platforms.

Elevate your auditory journey with the Bowers & Wilkins Px8 – where premium design meets unparalleled sound quality for a listening experience that transcends expectations.

products.title: Audio Technica ATHTWX7 Wireless Earbuds Black
products.body_html:
Audio Technica ATH-TWX7 Wireless Earbuds Black

"The new ATH-TWX7 could be a more affordable alternative to the Sony WF-1000XM5."- WhatHiFi ( Read Review here )

Introducing the Audio Technica ATH-TWX7 Wireless Earbuds: Revolutionizing High-Fidelity Sound

Experience unparalleled audio quality with the ATH-TWX7 wireless earbuds. Utilizing 5.8mm high-resolution drivers from the flagship ATH-TWX7, these earbuds deliver intricate music playback supporting 24-bit/96 kHz audio files. Their compact design ensures portability without compromising on performance.

Crystal-Clear Sound, Anywhere, Anytime

Featuring digital hybrid noise-cancelling technology, the ATH-TWX7 eliminates unwanted noise, offering impeccable sound performance. Seamlessly switch between hear-through and talk-through functions, effortlessly prioritizing conversations or external announcements while enjoying your music.

Advanced Call Clarity and Control

Equipped with built-in MEMS microphones and beamforming technology, the ATH-TWX7 ensures your voice is heard distinctly, even in noisy environments. Choose between Natural Mode or Noise-Reduction Mode for optimal call quality. The mute button provides added convenience during calls.

On-the-Go Performance and Durability

With approximately 6.5 hours of playback time and up to 20 hours using the non-slip portable charging case, the ATH-TWX7 provides reliable usage during your day. Designed with IPX4 water-resistant protection, these earbuds are suitable for various environments, including rain, water, and sweat.

Tailored Listening Experience

Customize your sound space with the ATH-TWX7. Utilize noise-cancelling functions for focused work, talk-through for heightened awareness, or unique soundscape options for concentration, relaxation, or meditation—all accessible through the earbud sensor's touch.

Comfort Meets Performance

The discreet, compact design of the ATH-TWX7 ensures a secure and comfortable fit for extended listening sessions. Choose between soft and standard eartips included for a personalized fit.

Enhanced Control with A-T CONNECT App

Maximize your control with the Audio-Technica CONNECT app. Access low latency mode, call modes, ambient control, EQ adjustments, touch sensor settings, soundscape functions, and more, enhancing your overall listening experience.

Unleash the full potential of your audio journey with the Audio Technica ATH-TWX7 wireless earbuds, offering unparalleled sound fidelity, customizable features, and seamless functionality through the A-T CONNECT app.

Features

  • Compact, truly wireless in-ear headphones with digital hybrid noise-cancelling technology

  • Ambience control (noise-cancelling, hear-through, talk-through) can be employed for music playback and calls

  • MEMS (micro-electromechanical system) mics, a high-accuracy noise-cancelling processor, and a proprietary filter work together to deliver stellar noise-cancelling performance

  • Hear-through function allows you to hear ambient sounds (plus your own, unmuffled voice) so you can talk to others around you without removing your earbuds

  • Talk-through function lets you hear voices/announcements around you by instantly lowering playback volume and capturing ambient sounds while enhancing the vocal bandwidth

  • 5.8 mm high-resolution drivers, adopted from the ATH-TWX7, deliver an extended high-frequency range and improved sound detail

  • LDAC codec compatibility enables playback of 24-bit/96 kHz audio files

  • Includes two sets of eartips (XS/S/M/L): Soft eartips for greater comfort during long listening sessions and standard eartips for a snugger, more secure fit

  • High-performance MEMS mics, beamforming technology, and two selectable call modes (Natural and Noise-Reduction) ensure crystal-clear call quality

  • Call test function allows you to check the tone and clarity of your voice

  • The microphone can be easily muted during calls via built-in controls on the earbuds

  • The Soundscape function plays relaxing sounds of nature, a masking noise to help you concentrate, or sounds for meditation

  • Private Timer function provides advanced personal time management

  • Multipoint pairing function allows you to stay connected to two Bluetooth devices at once

  • Approximately 6.5 hours of continuous playback and up to 13.5 hours of extended use with the charger (for 20 hours total, when noise-cancellation is in constant use)

  • A-T Connect app gives you additional control: activate low latency mode, select Natural and Noise-Reduction call modes, adjust and save EQ to the headphones, change codecs, and more

  • Compact charging case with non-slip finish is easy to handle and carry with you wherever you go

  • Available in three elegant colors: Ash Black (BK), Rich White (WH).

  • Rain and water splashproof design (IPX4*-equivalent)

  • Flexible dual- or single-ear usability

  • Includes 30 cm (1.0') USB-A/USB-C charging cable 

* IPX4 equivalent means that there is no harmful effect even if water is splashed from all directions. It cannot be used in hot and humid places such as baths. It is not completely waterproof.

Technical Specifications

Headphones
Type Dynamic
Driver Diameter 5.8mm
Frequency Response 10 - 40,000Hz
Sensitivity 100dB/mW
Impedance 16 ohms
Weight Headphones: Approx. 4.7 g (0.17 oz) (L side), approx. 4.7 g (0.17 oz) (R side);
Charging case: Approx. 47.5 g (1.7 oz)
Charging Time Headphones： Approx. 1.5 hours* Charging case： Approx. 3 hours (USB charging), Approx. 5 hours (wireless charging). Depending on operating conditions.
Operating Temperature 5℃ - 40℃ (41℉ to 104℉)
Operating Time Continuous transmission time (music playback): Max. approx. 6.5 hours with ANC on and 7.5 hours with ANC off (Headphones), Max. approx. 20.0 hours with ANC on and 24.0 hours with ANC off (if charging case is used in combination) Depending on operating conditions.
Microphone Type MEMS type
Microphone Sensitivity -38dB（1V/Pa, at 1kHz）
Microphone Polar Pattern Omnidirectional
Power Supply Headphones：DC3.85V lithium ion battery (built-in) Charging case：DC3.85V lithium ion battery (built-in)
Water-Resistant (drip-proof) Performance IPX4 (headphones only)
Accessories Included USB charging cable (30 cm (12") USB Type-A / USB Type-C) Eartips: Soft (XS, S, M, L), Standard (XS, S, M, L)
Notes *Charging takes longer when the temperature is below 10℃ (50℉) or above 30℃ (86℉). For product improvement, the product is subject to modification without notice.
Bluetooth®
Bluetooth® Version   Bluetooth Ver.5.1
Operating Range Line of sight - approx. 10 m (33')
Maximum RF Output 12mW EIRP

Supported Bit Rates  16bit, 24bit (When using LDAC codec)

products.title: Denon AH-D9200 Over-Ear Premium Flagship Hi-Fi Headphones
products.body_html:
Denon AH-D9200 Over-Ear Premium Flagship Hi-Fi Headphones

Experience audio excellence with the Denon AH-D9200 Over-Ear Premium Flagship Hi-Fi Headphones, featuring cutting-edge technology and luxurious design. Encased in exquisite Japanese bamboo, these headphones boast patented 50mm Free-Edge Nanofibre Drivers that eliminate unwanted resonances, delivering unparalleled sound precision.

The AH-D9200 headphones redefine the audio landscape with a Neodymium magnet exceeding 1 Tesla, ensuring a clean, distortion-free signal. Immerse yourself in reference-quality sound, characterized by precise low-end tones and crisp highs, making them an irresistible choice at this price point. Denon's rich heritage shines through, presenting solid levels of reproduction in the form of these over-ear headphones.

Key Features:

  • Patented 50mm FreeEdge Nanofiber driver with over 1 Tesla Neodymium magnet for high-resolution, distortion-free audio.
  • Distinguished Japanese Bamboo wood Earcup with inherent acoustic properties for enhanced sound dampening and accurate sound reproduction.
  • Soft, engineered Japanese leather over ergonomic memory foam earpads for maximum comfort during extended listening sessions.
  • Aluminium diecast hanger with genuine leather headband for durable, quality craftsmanship.
  • 3.0m silver-coated OFC cable with 6.3mm plug for the highest quality Hi-Fi listening experiences.
  • 1.3m audio cable with 3.5mm plug for portable music players and a pure audio signal.
  • Luxury hard storage case and cleaning cloth to keep your AH-D9200 safe and pristine.
  • Engineered with a more than 100-year Denon legacy in audio excellence for the ultimate audio experience.

Premium Sound

Immerse yourself in sound that defies expectations. The patented 50mm FreeEdge Nanofiber drivers eliminate unwanted resonances and distortion, providing the most accurate sound reproduction. The Japanese Bamboo wood housing adds warmth and life to your music with its natural acoustic properties.

Ergonomic Comfort

Designed for extended wear, the AH-D9200 offers a universal fit with minimal side pressure. The lightweight construction, engineered soft leather ear pads, and 3D-shaped memory foam ensure a comfortable listening experience for as long as you desire.

Premium Craftsmanship

Drawing from a legacy of over 100 years, the AH-D9200 features superb craftsmanship with authentic Japanese Bamboo wood housing. The combination of soft, engineered, and genuine leather materials complements the organic style of the wood, creating an artisanal design that matches audiophile sound.

Durable Materials

Preserve refined sound with strong materials. The durable diecast aluminium hanger and genuine leather headband ensure long-lasting quality. The detachable cables and luxury case guarantee that the AH-D9200 headphones provide superior sound and comfort for years to come.

Patented 50mm Free-Edge Nanofibre Drivers

The AH-D9200 headphones showcase unique Japanese-made FreeEdge 50mm drivers, canceling out unwanted resonances for detailed, accurate sound. Mounted on vibration-reducing engineered resin baffles, these drivers provide the purest sound possible.

High-quality Cables for Seamless Listening

Equipped with two high-grade audio cables, the AH-D9200 ensures an optimal listening experience. The finely crafted silver-coated 3.0m cable with a 6.3mm plug is ideal for HiFi systems, while the 1.3m OFC cable with a 3.5mm plug is perfect for portable digital audio players, offering impeccable accuracy and quality.

100+ Years of Firsts in Audio Technology

Founded in 1910, Denon's deep heritage in audio technology guarantees the latest advancements and the highest quality in every listening experience. Trust in a brand that has consistently delivered "firsts" in the audio industry, ensuring an unparalleled audio journey.

Technical Specifications

Impedance 24ohm
Frequency Response 5-56.000Hz
Driver Diameter 50mm
Sensitivity 105dB/mW
Driver Type Nanofiber FreeEdge
Maximum Power Input 1.800mW
Weight 375 g

products.title: Audio Technica ATHTWX9 Wireless Earbuds
products.body_html:
Audio-Technica ATH-TWX9 Truly Wireless Earbuds with Digital Hybrid Noise-Cancelling Technology

Looking for wireless earphones that excel in workouts and travel? Look no further than the Audio Technica ATH-TWX9. These cutting-edge earphones feature digital hybrid noise-cancelling technology, ensuring an uninterrupted listening experience by eliminating interference from your surroundings.

Experience Realistic 3D Soundstage and UV Sterilization

Not only do the ATH-TWX9 earphones deliver exceptional sound quality, but they also offer a realistic 3D soundstage that will transport you to your favorite music. To top it off, these high-quality earbuds have been deep UV sterilized for hygiene and cleanliness.

Bluetooth Connectivity and Extended Playback

With Bluetooth connectivity, the ATH-TWX9 allows for seamless pairing with your devices. Enjoy up to 6 hours of continuous playback, providing you with music throughout your workout or travel journey. Worried about battery life? Fear not! The extended use feature grants you up to 18.5 hours of playback.

Optimized for Commuting and Workouts

Designed with commuters and fitness enthusiasts in mind, the ATH-TWX9 excels in any environment. Equipped with advanced noise-canceling modes and five presets, you can optimize noise cancellation to suit your surroundings. These earbuds are splashproof, making them resistant to rain, water, and sweat.

Unmatched Comfort and Practicality

Featuring a non-slip and compact design, the ATH-TWX9 earphones offer an ergonomic layout that ensures a comfortable fit. With twelve selectable ear tips included—offering four diameter sizes and three stem lengths—you can find the perfect fit for your ears. Get ready for the most comfortable and practical noise-cancelling headphones available.

Immersive Sound with Sony's 360 Reality Audio

Discover Sony's groundbreaking 360 Reality Audio with the ATH-TWX9 earbuds. Unlike traditional headphones, this technology provides a 360-degree soundscape, immersing you in a captivating audio experience. Sony's connect app analyzes your unique ear shape, tailoring the audio to deliver the best possible 3D sound. Prepare to be amazed as vocals, instruments, and effects come to life all around you.

Enhanced Audio Quality and Low Latency Mode

The ATH-TWX9 boasts newly designed 5.8mm hi-res drivers, offering an extended frequency range that delivers deep lows and spectacular highs. Qualcomm cVc Generation 8.0 technology enhances audio detail by minimizing ambient and road noise, resulting in clear voice transmission. Engage in the low latency mode for minimal sound delay when gaming or watching videos. With a frequency range spanning from 10Hz to 40KHz, every note will be faithfully reproduced.

The Advantages of Earbuds

Earbuds provide a convenient and comfortable alternative to traditional headphones, especially during active pursuits like jogging or running. They fit snugly inside the ear without the need for a headband, providing freedom of movement. The ATH-TWX9's noise cancelling technology effectively suppresses environmental sounds such as road or vehicle noise, granting you privacy while using your smartphone. Additionally, these earbuds incorporate proprietary Qualcomm CVC technology to enhance voice reception from your smartphone.

Choosing the Perfect Earbuds

When selecting earbuds, it's crucial to consider certain factors. The ATH-TWX9 stands out with its top-quality Bluetooth chip, powered by Qualcomm, ensuring seamless connectivity. Equipped with a high-density battery, these earphones offer extended use without compromising performance. Constructed with durability in mind, they can withstand heavy use. Furthermore, the ATH-TWX9 supports high-resolution audio, guaranteeing an immersive listening experience. Lastly, the ear tips play a crucial role in sound quality and the ATH-TWX9.

Features

  • Truly wireless in-ear headphones with digital hybrid noise-cancelling technology.
  • Ambience control (noise-cancelling and hear-through) can be employed for music playback and calls.
  • Use the touch sensor to choose from five preset noise-cancelling modes or optimized noise cancelling that adapts to your current environment.
  • Hear-through function allows you to hear ambient sounds (plus your own, unmuffled voice) so you can talk to others around you without removing your earbuds.
  • Newly designed 5.8 mm high-resolution drivers deliver an extended high-frequency range and improved sound detail.
  • Compatible with Qualcomm® Snapdragon Sound™, Qualcomm® aptX™ Adaptive audio, and Sony’s 360 Reality Audio to deliver an advanced listening experience.
  • Eartips feature a hybrid structure of hard and soft silicone for best fit and sound performance, and come in three different lengths for each size. (XS/S/M/L)
  • Dual high-performance MEMS (micro-electromechanical system) mics, beamforming technology, and Qualcomm® cVc™ Generation 8.0 technology ensure crystal-clear call quality.
  • Sidetone circuitry improves conversations by letting you hear your voice in the headphones when making calls on most smartphones.
  • Qualcomm® TrueWireless Mirroring enables independent transmission to the left and right earbuds, reducing sound interruptions and delays for videos.
  • Multipoint pairing function allows you to stay connected to two Bluetooth devices at once.
  • Approximately 6 hours of continuous playback and up to 12.5 hours of extended use with the charger (for 18.5 hours total).
  • Charging case’s deep-UV LED sterilization system (with unique mirror processing) eliminates bacteria and viruses from the surface of the headphones**.
  • A-T Connect app gives you additional control: activate low latency mode, personalize noise-cancelling system, adjust and save EQ to the headphones, change L/R volume balance, select desired voice assistant (such as Amazon Alexa Built-in or Google Assistant), change codecs, and more.
  • Rain and water splashproof design (IPX4*-equivalent).
  • Flexible dual- or single-ear usability.
  • Includes 30 cm (1.0') USB-A/USB-C charging cable
* IPX4 equivalent means that there is no harmful effect even if water is splashed from all directions. It cannot be used in hot and humid places such as baths. It is not completely waterproof.

** The system is more than 99% effective against E. coli and bacteriophage viruses, and more than 90% effective against Staphylococcus aureus, but it is not effective against all bacteria and viruses. The effectiveness against the novel coronavirus has not been verified.

Audio-Technica ATHM50xLAB Wired Limited-Edition Headphones: Unmatched Sound and Durability

The Audio-Technica ATH-M50xLAB Wired Limited-Edition Headphones are part of the critically acclaimed M-Series, known for delivering professional-quality sound and outstanding comfort. Whether you're in the studio, DJing, or simply enjoying your favorite tracks, these headphones provide an unmatched audio experience that enthusiasts and professionals swear by.

Why Choose M-Series Headphones?

The M-Series headphones are renowned for their accurate audio reproduction, durable build, and superior comfort, making them ideal for long listening or mixing sessions. With contoured earcups that offer excellent sound isolation, you can fully immerse yourself in your music or work with minimal bleed.

These headphones are made with pro-grade materials, ensuring durability even with regular use. Whether you're tracking, mixing, or just listening on the go, the ATH-M50xLAB offers a level of comfort that makes them perfect for extended use.

products.title: Sony WF-C510 True Wireless Bluetooth In Ear Headphones Blue
products.body_html:
Sony WF-C510 True Wireless Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones Blue

Sony WF-C510 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds - Superior Sound, Lightweight Comfort, and Packed with Features

Looking for high-performance wireless earbuds? The Sony WF-C510 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds in sleek Blue are designed to deliver an exceptional audio experience while being compact and ultra-lightweight. Perfect for music lovers and active users, these earbuds provide a comfortable fit, long battery life, and smart features to elevate your listening experience.

Ultra-Lightweight & Ergonomic Design

Each earbud weighs just 4.6g, making the Sony WF-C510 earbuds one of the lightest in Sony's lineup. The ergonomic design ensures they stay secure and comfortable, even during extended wear. Whether you're commuting, working out, or simply relaxing, these earbuds offer all-day comfort and stability.

Enhanced Audio Quality with Sony’s DSEE Technology

Enjoy your music the way it was meant to be heard. The WF-C510 features Sony's DSEE (Digital Sound Enhancement Engine), which upscales compressed audio files to near-original sound quality. With the companion app, you can fine-tune your audio preferences using an intuitive equalizer. Whether you want more bass for a fuller sound or boosted treble for crystal-clear vocals, the customizable settings let you create your perfect audio experience.

Ambient Sound Mode for Safety & Awareness

Stay aware of your environment while listening to your favorite tracks with Ambient Sound Mode. Perfect for outdoor activities like jogging, or when you need to hear important announcements, this mode allows you to listen to your surroundings without taking off your earbuds.

Long Battery Life with Quick Charge

The Sony WF-C510 earbuds offer up to 22 hours of total playback – 11 hours from the earbuds themselves, plus an additional 11 hours from the charging case. And with the quick-charge feature, just 5 minutes of charging gives you an extra hour of listening time. Say goodbye to running out of power mid-day!

products.title: Bowers & Wilkins PX8 Noise Cancelling Headphones Dark Forest
products.body_html:
Bowers & Wilkins PX8 Noise Cancelling Headphones Dark Forest

The Bowers & Wilkins Px8 headphones are a flagship model offering exceptional sound quality, thanks to a 24-bit DSP and aptX Adaptive wireless technology for crystal-clear audio. Their carbon-coned drivers are angled for precise sound delivery, while advanced Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) with six microphones effectively blocks outside noise. Crafted with premium materials, including Dark Forest Nappa leather and lightweight aluminum arms, the Px8 provides both luxury and comfort for extended wear. The Bowers & Wilkins Music app allows control over ANC, battery life, and acoustic settings. With up to 30 hours of battery life and fast charging, these headphones offer convenience and top-tier performance.

Flagship Wireless Headphones Setting the Standard
The Bowers & Wilkins Px8 headphones lead the range, offering exceptional audio performance, premium materials, and advanced technology with iconic style.

Award-Winning Sound
At the core of the Px8 is a high-resolution 24-bit DSP, combined with aptX Adaptive wireless technology for top-tier Bluetooth sound. The carbon-coned drive units, angled towards your ears, deliver crystal-clear, detailed, and accurate audio.

Outstanding Noise Cancellation
The Px8 excels in Active Noise Cancelling (ANC), using six microphones and proprietary technology to cancel outside noise with precision. Calls are also clearer, with less distortion for both you and your caller.

Premium Comfort
Crafted with premium materials, the Px8 features darkened aluminum arms and Dark Forest Nappa leather trim for a luxurious look. Soft ear pads ensure a snug yet comfortable fit, while its lightweight design enhances long-term comfort.

Intuitive App Control
The Bowers & Wilkins Music app offers control over ANC levels, battery life, and a standby timer. It also includes new acoustic settings, allowing you to adjust bass and treble to your preference.

Long Battery Life
With up to 30 hours of battery life, the Px8 is perfect for long use, even with Bluetooth and ANC enabled. A quick 15-minute charge gives you seven hours of playback, ensuring you’re never left without your music.

Experience the ultimate in wireless freedom, superior sound quality, and immersive noise-cancelling technology with the Sony WF-C700N Wireless Noise Cancelling Earbuds Black. Designed for active lifestyles, these earbuds deliver comfort, performance, and durability, making them ideal for workouts, running, or everyday listening.

Key Features of the Sony WF-C700N Earbuds:

Truly Wireless Listening

The WF-C700N earbuds offer true wireless freedom, with no cables to hold you back. Enjoy a seamless listening experience with two independent earbuds that fit comfortably and securely, giving you the freedom to move without restrictions.

Digital Noise Cancelling & Ambient Sound Mode

  • Noise Cancelling Technology: Immerse yourself in your favorite music by blocking out external distractions. Perfect for intense focus during workouts or relaxation.
  • Ambient Sound Mode: Stay aware of your surroundings by blending your music with external sounds—ideal for running or commuting safely.

Ideal for Sports with IPX4 Water & Sweat Resistance

Engineered for active lifestyles, these earbuds are IPX4-rated, ensuring they resist sweat and splashes. Whether you're hitting the gym, running, or powering through your daily routine, the WF-C700N earbuds keep up with you.

Ergonomic Comfort for All-Day Wear

Sony designed these earbuds with your comfort in mind. Their ergonomic surface perfectly matches the shape of your ear for a secure and stable fit, so you can wear them all day without discomfort.

Superior Sony Sound Quality

  • Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE): Restores compressed digital music files to near-original quality, so every beat sounds its best.

Wide Compatibility

These true wireless earbuds work seamlessly with all Bluetooth-enabled devices, including Apple, Samsung, Google, and other Android smartphones, making them the perfect companion for any smart device.
